dashboardAttributes.description: Specifies additional settings for your VDM configuration as applicable to the Dashboard.

guardianAttributes.description: Specifies additional settings for your VDM configuration as applicable to the Guardian.

vdmEnabled.description:
Specifies the status of your VDM configuration. Valid values: `ENABLED`, `DISABLED`.

The following arguments are optional:
